==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=不足为外人道|type=2121}}

===Etymology===
* '''421:''' [[w:Tao Yuanming|Tao Yuanming]], ''[[s:The Peach Blossom Spring|The Peach Blossom Spring]]'' (桃花源記)
*: [[停]][[數日]]，[[辭去]]。[[此]][[中]][[人]][[語]][[云]]：「'''不足為外人道'''[[也]]。」
*:: ''He stayed on for a few more days before taking his leave. As he was departing, some of them said to him, "'''No need to tell outsiders''' about us."'' (Wiktionary translation)
